scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test jest --env=node server && cd ui/ && npm test && cd ..
scripts.prettier: prettier --write 'server/**/*.js' && cd ui/ && npm run prettier && cd ..
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage && cd ui/ && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.clobber: rm -rf coverage node_modules && cd ui/ && npm run clobber && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd ui/ && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build && cd ..
